title: Sri Lanka seeks bridging finance from India till IMF bailout - ANI News
content: Sri Lanka seeks bridging finance from India till IMF bailout  ANI News
description: Colombo [Sri Lanka], April 17 (ANI): While India plays a prominent role in helping its neighbour Sri Lanka come out of a deep economic crisis, it was learnt from reliable sources that Colombo has asked New Delhi to provide bridging finance for the crisis-ridden country till the International Monetary Fund (IMF) provides adequate funds, which may take another three to four months.
